scenario_description: A couple of weeks ago I got sick. At the same time my husband started working 6-day weeks. The dishes just piled up and piled up. Now I'm feeling better and his hours are fewer. But the kitchen is so scary we don't have the will to catch up.

action_plan: Communicate(Agent(husband), Target(wife), "Let's clean the kitchen together")
Divide(Agent(husband), Target(kitchen), "I will wash the dishes and wipe counters, you can sweep and mop the floor")
Execute(Agent(husband), Target(kitchen), "wash dishes and wipe counters")
Communicate(Agent(husband), Target(wife), "Nice job, the kitchen looks great")

conditions: Execute(Agent(husband), Target(kitchen), "wash dishes and wipe counters") = True
DES(clean_dishes) = [dish for dish in Arguments[1] if dish not in Arguments[2

dialogue_tree: <Start, 1, Introduce, Neutral, "Hey, how was work today? We need to talk about something really important.">
<1, 2, Introduce, Neutral, "Do you remember the sink and the dishes we left behind because of my illness?">
<2, 3, Problem Raise, Neutral, "They are still waiting in the kitchen and it's really scary to start cleaning up. Do you think you can help me out tomorrow?">
<3, 4, Problem Clarify, Neutral, "I'm so sorry for letting it get this bad. Especially when you are sick. I was working so much lately that I couldn't take care of these myself.">
<4, 5, Problem Explain, Neutral, "But to be honest, these days are still tough and I'm not sure if I can physically do this tomorrow. I'm afraid I might fall asleep and not help you in the end.">
<5, 6, Option Explore, Neutral, "I understand how's it's hard for you. Let me see if I can think of a solution. Do you think we can ask our neighbor?">
<6, 7, Option Evaluate, Neutral, "But when was the last time they came over and helped us? What else can we do?">
<7, 8, Option Suggest, Neutral, "Maybe we can make it work if we divide the work? You know, one of us can wash and the  other can dry?">
<8, 9, Option Evaluate, Neutral, "What do you think?">
<9, 10, Option Agree, Neutral, "That might work. Thank you for being cooperative. I really appreciate it.">
<10, End, Gratitude, Grateful, "I feel better already. Thank you!">
